definition: the nine springs/the underworld of Chinese mythology/Hades

sentences.english: His behavior will make his parents turn in their grave.
sentences.chinese: 他的行为会令他死去的父母在九泉之下不得安宁的。

sentences.english: What he did makes his father turn in his grave.
sentences.chinese: 他的所为使他的父亲在九泉也不得安宁。

definition: soul and spirit of the deceased
the Yellow Springs/the underworld of Chinese mythology/the equivalent of Hades or Hell
lit. the mountains crumble and the trees lie ruined/a great sage has died (idiom)
the hidden and the visible/that which can be seen and that which cannot/darkness and light/night and day/wisdom and ignorance/evil and good/the living and the dead/men and ghosts
old variant of 豐都|丰都[Feng1 du1]/Fengdu county Chongqing municipality/name of a famous necropolis
Ceaseless pain (Sanskrit: Avici), one of the Buddhist hells/fig. hell/hell on earth
